description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Designful Stylish Price List – Price Table Builder & QR Code Restaurant Menu.This issue affects Stylish Price List – Price Table Builder & QR Code Restaurant Menu: from n/a through 7.0.17.
